about_the_game:
Welcome to the new world of Mississauga Tycoon. You can explore the various styles of Mississauga, such as horror, suspense, thriller, science fiction, and aesthetics. Can you escape perfectly and find out the truth? Become an escape master and create a perfect escape myth.
------------------------------------------------------------------
[Back to the Dormitory]
Since the incident broke out, the school has been circulated with the sound of female crying at night. Many girls said they heard it, which forced the whole school to take some measures. Dormitory 404 was sealed and no students were allowed to stay there. However, this still could not stop the development of the situation. More and more people said they heard crying... The incident happened during the holiday this year. Yazhuangzhuang, a student in dormitory 404, killed three roommates and then committed suicide. As Yazhuangzhuang's best friend, of course she would not believe it, but all the evidence pointed to Yazhuangzhuang as the murderer. On this day, you decided to investigate the truth of the whole matter and quietly came to the 404 dormitory...

------------------------------------------------------------------
[Perfect Wax Figure]
Professor Dusha is a famous wax figure craftsman with extraordinary wax figure making skills. His wax figures are famous for their lifelike and vividness. He has many wax museums named after him. He was arrested for murder not long ago, which caused an uproar. Although Professor Dusha confessed to the crime, there are still many doubts. As a famous detective, you are invited by the police to investigate the case again.

------------------------------------------------------------------
[Halloween Adventure]
Oliver is a kind little girl and the apple of the eye of the Q family. The Q family is a powerful family in the state, and her grandfather is a famous entrepreneur. This is a family business. Oliver's great-grandfather founded it 100 years ago. Her father, grandfather, and uncle all hold important positions in the business. Oliver has never seen her grandmother. She doesn't even know what she looks like. Oliver likes dancing very much, but her family doesn't allow her to dance, and she is rarely allowed to go out. This day is Ghost Festival. It is said that people in the underworld can meet their families on this day. She secretly made an appointment with her friends to go dancing. The adults in the family knew about this and locked her in the house and didn't allow her to go out. And she...

------------------------------------------------------------------
[Choose Life]
When years, trivial matters, life, and pressure have worn down the feelings of parents, a family storm finally came. When I learned that my parents were getting divorced, how should I choose? It's all up to you!

name: 密市大亨

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8.1/10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i Series & AMD Zen R Series
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nivdia GTX/RTX Series & AMD RX Series (4G VRAM)
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 8.1/10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i Series & AMD Zen R Series
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nivdia GTX/RTX Series & AMD RX Series (4G VRAM)
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Welcome to the brand new world of Mississauga Tycoon. Various styles of Mississauga, including horror, suspense, thriller, science fiction, and aesthetics, are waiting for you to explore. Can you escape perfectly and find out the truth? Become an escape master and create a perfect escape myth?
